price: 74. Markay baqdintii ka tagtay Ibraahiim, oo u timid bishaaradu, wuxuu billaabay inuu nagala doodo arrinta qolodii Luud.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahaba ʿan ib'rāhīma al-rawʿu wajāathu al-bush'rā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭin
